underlying_goal: Implement a backend fix to force the last subtitle's komi_type away from komi_normal, then run a full 8-step integration test of the registration workflow via the browser UI
friction_detail: Playwright MCP was locked requiring fallback to Chrome DevTools, session data wasn't persisted after generation requiring manual workarounds, and the 8-step test stalled at STEP 2 due to missing summary/Y-N generation prerequisite.
brief_summary: User asked to implement a komi_type enforcement rule (completed successfully with Codex review) and then run a full 8-step integration test, which stalled at STEP 2 due to infrastructure and workflow prerequisite issues.
